name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-graph-groupviewer
title: Graph Group Viewer
shortDescription: Search for groups in your tenant and allow you to view the details of the selected group as well as view a list of group members and export the list of members to a CSV file
longDescription: This webpart will provide the functionality to search for groups in your tenant and allow you to view the details of the selected group as well as view a list of group members and export the list of members to a CSV file

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
